about_the_game:
Year 2099. The Solar System has been conquered and colonized by the human race. It's a time of prosperity for humans. But we are not alone.

The colony on Jupiter's moon Europa is invaded and destroyed by an alien civilization with incredibly superior combat power to ours. Thousands of men, women, and children are annihilated, and the survivors are used as slaves.

In this situation, the United Planets Organization mobilizes the "Strike Force" army division, specialists in assault space operations. The only way to defeat the enemy is through infiltration with small ships that can't be detected by radar. Once on the satellite, they must enter the alien facilities and destroy their control and energy centers.

These commandos are humanity's last hope. In a risky mission, a "Strike Force" spaceship heads to Europa with one objective: REVENGE.


Objective:

The temple is controlled by computers, and the facilities are protected by a security system that uses passwords. There is a main computer that manages the entire temple system; you must find it and activate the self-destruct process.

Officers have the codes for the security systems and main computers. You must locate them and obtain their passwords. You can recognize them because they usually don't carry weapons.

Once the destruction process begins, you have 3 minutes and 30 seconds to escape. Intelligence services have discovered a hangar where you can steal an aerobike and leave the temple.

If you encounter any colonists, you must teleport them.


Mechanics:

It's a game in isometric perspective set in a mapped environment with rooms connected by doors, similar to isometric video games from the 1980s.

The character we control can move in 8 directions using the WASD keys and uses the mouse as a movement guide and two modes of action by right-clicking:

In combat mode, the pointer becomes a reticle, and we can shoot with the left button wherever the reticle points using the selected weapon. To select the weapon, we press the keys 1-Machine gun, 2-Missile launcher, or 3-Flamethrower.
In normal mode, the pointer becomes a hand indicating with a movement which objects or elements in the room we can interact with using the left button as well.

name: Strike Force Commando

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8670M, equivalent or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8670M, equivalent or higher

short_description: Space action adventure set in a desolate world in 2099.
